elements.title: Joseph Pierce
elements.contents: ... that Chinese-born Joseph Pierce (pictured) enlisted as a Union Army soldier, fought at the Battle of Gettysburg during the American Civil War, and was made a corporal?

elements.title: We Work the Black Seam
elements.contents: ... that Sting wrote "We Work the Black Seam" because he felt that "the case for coal was never put to the nation" during the 1984–85 British miners' strike, which began 40 years ago today?

elements.title: James May
elements.contents: ... that James May led the team that transplanted a patient's right hand onto his left arm?

elements.title: Saint Melangell's shrine
elements.contents: ... that Saint Melangell's shrine was reconstructed from pieces of the 12th-century original found in the walls of the church and lychgate?

elements.title: Rana Reider
elements.contents: ... that Rana Reider has trained athletes who won Olympic gold medals in five different events?

elements.title: Carnival
elements.contents: ... that in the song "Carnival", Kanye West references several public figures including Elon Musk and Taylor Swift?

elements.title: Sardar
elements.contents: ... that the horse Sardar was gifted to Jacqueline Kennedy during her 1962 goodwill tour of Pakistan?

elements.title: a Renaissance-style palazzo
elements.contents: ... that a school in New York City occupies a Renaissance-style palazzo and a "French Renaissance hotel"?
